attributes.title: i’m on mars because of this app
attributes.review: before i downloaded this app i was a full trump supporter but this app completely changed my perspective on our cheeto of a president. when i first downloaded it i was very excited to go on it, unfortunately it took over 2 years to download and whilst it was downloading i could not use any other apps on my phone. the second it downloaded i excitedly clicked on it. i was absolutely appalled at the image on my screen. it was trump wearing nothing but diaper and holding a rattle. i was in complete dismay of this image. it started appearing in my dreams and little by little started taking over my whole life. now everywhere i go this image appears. i tried to delete the app multiple times but every time i did a teacup would fly into my room through my window and start singing gabbie hanna. i finally threw my phone away because i could not take the torture of this teacup anymore. this was the worst decision i have ever made. i got a new phone and a new apple account as a whole to insure this did not happen again, yet somehow it did. the only app downloaded on my new phone when i got it was the trump app!! i tried deleting it but when i did the teacup came back into my room but this time holding a lightsaber. he challenged me to a battle which i accepted for i went through jedi school during the 2 years while i was waiting for this app to download. alas my lightsaber skills were no match for the mighty teacup. he threw me onto mars with just one swipe of his saber. i am now crafting this review from mars where i have been for the past month with nothing to drink except for covfefe. if anyone knows how to get back to earth it would be much appreciated. the image of trump still haunts me to this day. i am proud to say i am now a liberal. and for anyone who’s wondering if there is life on mars, the answer is yes. there are a bunch of talking cheetos with magnifying glasses who constantly chant the theme song “martha speaks”. in conclusion, do not download this app unless you want to be put through a similar situation.
